title: Configuration (/sdks/ar-io-sdk/(ario-contract)/configuration)
content: The ARIO client class exposes APIs relevant to the ar.io process. It can be configured to use any AO Process ID that adheres to the [ARIO Network Spec]. By default, it will use the current [ARIO Testnet Process]. Refer to [AO Connect] for more information on how to configure an ARIO process to use specific AO infrastructure.
